function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Employees concerned about exposure to contagious diseases in the workplace.","Impact":"Increased risk of illness and absenteeism if not addressed.","Mitigation":"Implement strict safety protocols and regularly communicate them to employees.","Technologies":"Digital health monitoring systems, contact tracing apps.","People":"Employees, visitors, customers.","Owner":"Employers, workplace safety committees."},{"Description":"Economic uncertainty affecting employees' ability to meet basic needs.","Impact":"Decreased job satisfaction, productivity, and mental well-being.","Mitigation":"Transparent communication, financial support programs, flexible work arrangements.","Technologies":"Financial planning software, remote work technologies.","People":"Employees, HR department, leadership.","Owner":"Employers, HR department."}]}
